snippet: Though Hollywood is focused on the Oscars, stories under the radar include a Hollywood fixer's tell-all and developments in a lawsuit involving Deadline.com and The Hollywood Reporter.
abstract: Though Hollywood is focused on the Oscars, stories under the radar include a Hollywood fixer's tell-all and developments in a lawsuit involving Deadline.com and The Hollywood Reporter.

headline.main: A Hollywood Tell-All and a Dispute Over Awards News
